3:

Text: Gran i General Consell:  The body that was to become the Gran i General Consell was founded in 1249, and the Consell was abolished on 22 July 1718 by Philip V, empowered by the Nova Planta Decree of Majorca and Ibiza (28 November 1715).
Triplets:<Gran i General Consell
